name: create drill path
desc: Produce a line path through a volume dependent on a starting locations and user defined restrictions.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Initial Drill Position
properties.desc: The Starting point of the drill path

properties.name: Initial Drill Direction
properties.desc: The Heading and Dip of the Initial Drill Direction.

properties.name: Max Length
properties.desc: The Max Length will prevent users from creating lines that cannot reach their target.

properties.name: Segment List
properties.desc: The list of line segments to create.

properties.name: Boring Name
properties.desc: The Boring Name is used when exporting the created drill path as an APDV file

properties.name: Output Units
properties.desc: The Output units is used when exporting the created drill path as an APDV file

properties.name: Export As APDV
properties.desc: The Export As APDV file will export the line as an apdv file with data assocatiated with distance down the line.

properties.name: Export As TXT
properties.desc: The Export As TXT file will export the line as a tab delimited file with data assocatiated with distance down the line.
